item.title: Been working on this for ages... someone please help before i shoot myself
item.dc:creator: @IKICKASS IKICKASS
item.description:
@IKICKASS wrote:

Yes, and it goes from the same one error to 3 new errors. They are:

.\rush you\io\packets\commands.java:877: illegal start of type
} catch (exception error)
^
.\rush you\io\packets\commands.java:877: ‘;’ expected
} catch (exception error)
^
.\rush you\io\packets\commands.java:878: reached end of file while parsing
error.printStackTrace();
^
3 Errors press any key to continue . . .

-.-

item.title: Been working on this for ages... someone please help before i shoot myself
item.dc:creator: @IKICKASS IKICKASS
item.description:
@IKICKASS wrote:

(This is my commands.java for my 508 server)
//======END OF COMMANDS.JAVA====//
EXACT QUOTE:

else if (cmd[0].equals(“clangame”))
{
for(Player pz : Engine.players) {
if (pz != null)
{
pz.frames.setString(pz, “Join Team 1”, 458, 1);
pz.frames.setString(pz, “Join Team 2”, 458, 2);
pz.frames.setString(pz, “No I don’t want to play.”, 458, 3);
pz.frames.showChatboxInterface(pz, 458);
pz.Smithing = false;
pz.ClanGame = true;
pz.Cooking = false;
pz.TalkAgent = false;
pz.DecorChange = false;

}
}
}
}
}//===========END OF ADMIN COMMANDS======================

} catch (Exception error)
error.printStackTrace();

//=======THE END===========//

Compile and get:

.\Rush You\io\packets\Commands.java:879: class, interface, or enum expected
} catch (Exception error)
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

[move]HELP PLEASE!![/move]
ANYONE THAT CAN HELP ME FIX THIS WILL GET ADMIN ON MY SERVER!
Go To l3g3nd4rypkz.co.nr to check it out =)

Read full topic
